name: Fire

pages.text: To make fire, first you will need a $(thing)firestarter$(). To light things like $(thing)forges$(), or place a fire block, hold right-click on the ground.

Making a $(thing)firepit$() is a little more involved. Drop (Q) at least one $(thing)log$(), three $(thing)sticks$(), and up to three $(thing)straw$() on the ground. The straw are optional, but increase your chances of lighting. Hold right-click with your firestarter to light it. It may take several tries.
